@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The blocker element is used to block interaction with the application.

It is usually transparent or semi-transparent and blocks all events from
the underlying elements.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
backgroundColor {Color?null} the blocker's background color. This
color can be themed and will be resolved by the blocker.
@param.description:
the blocker's background color. This
color can be themed and will be resolved by the blocker.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Stop the event propagation from the passed event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Mouse} mouse event to stop propagation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Refreshes the cursor by setting it to null and then to the old value.
